I want to add the following event to the RSE calendar:

```yaml
  - summary: event title
    description: |
      A description of your event
      over multiple
       lines.
       With URLs wrapped in <www.example.com>
    location: A venue
    begin: YYYY-mm-DD HH:MM:SS
    duration: { minutes: 45 }
    event_url: some_url
```
